header.description: In-depth analysis for acting, film, music, and creators. Pro-level feedback and guidance, all the way to your breakthrough.

capabilitiesModal.subtitle: Upload a video, add a script or notes for accuracy, drop in any instructions—then hit ACTION!

capabilitiesCoach.0_desc: Add, edit, and manage trainees—name, email, phone, notes. All saved in your browser.
capabilitiesCoach.1_desc: Save every analysis to trainees. Track progress. Pull up past takes anytime.
capabilitiesCoach.2_desc: Compare up to 4 takes at once. See growth across trainees or over time.
capabilitiesCoach.3_desc: Export pro reports per trainee—analyses, trends, stats, development.
capabilitiesCoach.4_desc: Actors, musicians, creators, influencers. Each with its own expert panel.
capabilitiesCoach.5_desc: Standard: focused, clear. Deep: timecodes, micro-notes, industry benchmarks.
capabilitiesCoach.6_desc: Top 3 by default. Switch to All 8 anytime.
capabilitiesCoach.7_desc: Trainees, analyses, comparisons—all stored in your browser. Persists between sessions.
capabilitiesCoach.8_desc: See trainee growth over time. Trends, strengths, areas to work on.
capabilitiesCoach.9_desc: Clean design. Intuitive tools. Built for coaches and agencies.

coachTrack.restrictionMessage: Premium track is for coaches, studios and acting schools only. Upgrade to access.
coachTrack.alertMessage: Premium track is for coaches, studios and acting schools only. Upgrade your plan to access.
coachTrack.cardTooltip: Premium track not in your plan. Upgrade to unlock.

coachGuide.title: Usage & management – Premium track
coachGuide.subtitle: Quick guide for coaches and studios
coachGuide.step1Desc: Go to Trainee management and add trainees. Name, email, phone, notes. Saved in your browser.
coachGuide.step2Desc: Pick actors, musicians, creators, or influencers. Each has its own expert panel.
coachGuide.step3Desc: Top 3 by default. Pick specific experts or switch to All 8.
coachGuide.step4Desc: Standard: focused, clear. Deep: timecodes, micro-notes, industry benchmarks.
coachGuide.step5Desc: Pick the trainee from the list so the analysis saves to the right person.
coachGuide.step6Desc: Upload the video (limits vary by plan), add optional notes, hit ACTION!. Results in seconds.
coachGuide.step7Desc: Click Save for trainee to link the analysis. View it anytime in trainee management.
coachGuide.step8Desc: Use Compare takes for side-by-side. Export PDF for pro reports with trends.
coachGuide.warningP1: All data is stored locally in your browser only.
coachGuide.warningP2: Clear browser data = everything is gone. No recovery.
coachGuide.warningP3: We recommend Export data for backups.
coachGuide.tip4: PDF reports ready for print or sharing

subscription.contactDesc: Drop us a message. We'll get back soon.
subscription.faq0a: Yes. Works for creators at any level, including no prior experience.
subscription.faq1a: Upload a video, add context if you want. Our AI runs it through 8 virtual experts based on your track.
subscription.faq2q: What if I hit my analysis limit?
subscription.faq2a: Upgrade or wait for monthly renewal. We never charge automatically.
subscription.faq3a: Some videos (especially iPhone) are huge. Send to yourself via WhatsApp and re-download. Smaller file, same quality.
subscription.faq4a: No. Monthly plans. Pay for what you use.
subscription.faq5a: Yes. Access stays active until the end of your billing period.
subscription.faq6q: What happens after cancel or pause?
subscription.faq6a: Access stays until period end. No more charges.
subscription.faq7a: No. Billing covers the period already started.

trackDescription.actors: The main audition room of top drama productions—in your pocket. Cinematic standard. No compromise.
trackDescription.musicians: The judging panel of major music shows and top labels—in your pocket.
trackDescription.creators: The algorithm of TikTok, Reels, YouTube—in your pocket.
trackDescription.influencers: The strategy room of major brands and top agencies—in your pocket.
trackDescription.coach: Pro platform for coaches and agencies. Deep analysis, progress tracking, pro reports.

attachScript: Attach script / notes (PDF, TXT, DOC, DOCX)
